THE DECEASED PERSON'S GRANDMOTHERS AND GRANDFATHERS
(1) The estate of a deceased person who is not survived by either descendants or parents or the descendants or spouses thereof shall be inherited by the decedent's grandfathers and grandmothers.
(2) One half of the estate shall be inherited by the grandfather and grandmother on the father's side and the other half by the grandfather and grandmother on the mother's side.
